statements: UPDATE vehicle_information SET make='Honda', model='Civic', year=2018, miles_driven=50000, owner_name='John Doe' WHERE vehicle_id=12345;
UPDATE vehicle_information SET owner_name='Jane Doe', miles_driven=60000, year=2019, make='Toyota', model='Camry' WHERE vehicle_id=54321;
UPDATE vehicle_information SET year = 2019, miles_driven = 50000 WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry' AND owner_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE vehicle_information SET owner_name = 'Jane Smith', miles_driven = 60000 WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
UPDATE Vehicles SET make='Toyota', model='Camry', year=2018 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE Policies SET deductible=500.00, premium=1000.00 WHERE policy_id=3;
UPDATE Vehicles SET mileage = 50000, make = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 123
UPDATE Policies SET premium = 1500.50, deductible = 500.75 WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE VehicleInformation SET make='Toyota', year=2022 WHERE vehicle_id=1;

UPDATE VehicleInformation SET make = 'Toyota', model = 'Camry' WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
